Title: Adds public and nonpublic elementary and secondary schools to the New York power authority's list of mandated customers
Summary: Adds public and nonpublic elementary and secondary schools to the New York power authority's list of mandated customers.
LawCode: Amd ยง1005, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to adding public and nonpublic elementary and secondary schools to the list of the New York power authority's mandated customers
